name: ChampagneBoom
overview:
In a nutshell, they are fairly new to the market and so still consider themselves a independent enterprise. Having said that, our size doesn’t hinder their vision and only encourages the commitment to delivering a quality service that keeps their customers happy & coming back.

By working with a highly trained team of buyers and building strong relationships directly with the Champagne brands direct, they are able to source effectively & competitively allowing them to make a significant saving and pass that on to their customers.

They believe it all boils down to delivering the right balance of quality & value. There is no compromise. They understand the need for a fine bottle of fizz, but also understand that customers don’t want to break the bank every time they pop the cork!
